TopicTitle: Time to pla some Care-wait, where are my contracts????

Articles.Content:
I recently downloaded some new nods for my KSP. They seem to work fine (except for a texture problem I have wth some), but since I did, all my Career saves start with no contract! Wy is this happening?

My mods are:

TAC Life Support

USI Sounding Rockets

USI Survivability Pack

KAS

KIS

Dang It!

Entropy

Mech Jeb

Active Texture Management (Aggressive)

Texture Replacer

well KIS, KAS, ATM, Texture Replacer, TAC-LS, MechJeb shouldn't influence carreer behaviour.

I wouldn't think Dang It would do anything. I don't know what entropy is but I think maybe the USI sounding rockets could mess with your career.....

Otherwise, do you have Zero contracts or do you only have the starting contracts like "launch a vessel" "exceed altitude of x" because I read somewhere that you only get proper contracts after you have achieved orbit.

> 
> well KIS, KAS, ATM, Texture Replacer, TAC-LS, MechJeb shouldn't influence carreer behaviour.
> I wouldn't think Dang It would do anything. I don't know what entropy is but I think maybe the USI sounding rockets could mess with your career.....
> 
> Otherwise, do you have Zero contracts or do you only have the starting contracts like "launch a vessel" "exceed altitude of x" because I read somewhere that you only get proper contracts after you have achieved orbit.

Entropy is basically an add-on for Dang It. 

And when I say no contracts, I mean no contracts. I am supposed to begin with "launch a vessel", "reach an altitude of 5000 meters", "leave the atmosphere", and "reach orbit". I get literally nothing, even after launching an actual vessel.
Are you checking Mission Control first? You have to activate them first.

> 
> Are you checking Mission Control first? You have to activate them first.

Yep, I did. Nothing at All, Active, Completed, or Rejected. Nothing.
I suggest removing the mods and creating a new career save to see if the problem persists (unless you've done that already). If it still doesn't work, backup your stuff and just reinstall the game.

This might be a stupid suggestion, but are you sure you don't actually have those contracts active when you start? If I recall, the last time I started a career, I already had the very first basic contracts active, without having to accept them first.

I have the same problem...

Had contracts to select plus a couple of active contracts when I saved and exited the game.

Added some new mods using CKAN and restarted the game.

Active contracts had gone but still had contracts to select although they were different from before.

Again saved and exited the game and added some more mods including some contract packs and the associated mods.

Restart again and no contracts at all.

Anyone have any ideas.

Regards
